segments.text: Oh no, look at that sink overflowing everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just gushing out, soaking the cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is standing right there, drying dishes obliviously.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is in the puddle, she could slip any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the kids on the left, up to no good.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is on that shaky stool, stretching for cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It looks so unstable, he might fall and hurt himself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is waiting eagerly, hand out for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're being so quiet, not wanting to get caught.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window shows a nice garden, but inside it's chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope someone turns off the faucet soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This could turn into a big mess if not careful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The dishes on the counter might get knocked over too.
segments.speaker: PAR
